content: these mini dolls are only about 3 - 3½ high they are based on the duduza comfort dolls made for africa i knitted lots of these a few years ago duduza is a zulu word for comfort these knitted dolls are given in the hope that they bring comfort to aids/hiv-affected children in sub-saharan africa recently they have become popular again and often known as izzy dolls requirements dk yarn ~ small amounts of different colours 3 25mm or 3 5mm needles polyester stuffing this smaller sized version is perfect for little hands to hold so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
